snippet.title: Classic Game Room - GALAXIAN for Atari 2600 review
snippet.description:
Galaxian Atari 2600 review. http://www.ClassicGameRoom.com
Classic Game Room reviews GALAXIAN for Atari 2600 released in 1983!

Not to be confused with Galaga, this is a different game. Similar in style to Space Invaders or Demon Attack, Galaxian is a fun 1980's arcade retro classic that is fun to pick up and play.  Shoot the aliens before they shoot you, it's that simple.  The early 80's style of Galaxian makes it a popular game today, it is easy to collect for your Atari VCS 2600 game collection and has a bright, colorful design on the packaging.  Everyone like Galaxian.  You should name your dog Galaxian.

Be sure to watch the original Classic Game Room episodes. Classic Game Room was the original classic video game review show on the Internet in 1999-2000, now on DVD. Wii, PS3, Xbox 360.
